articles.title: Bill Muchero
articles.contents:
Bill Muchero
          
          
          Home
          
          
          Projects
           
          ▾
          
          
          Class Projects
          
          
          ☰
          
          
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Bill Muchero
            
            
              
                
                    
                      
                        LinkedIn
                      
                    
                  
                                  
            
          
        
        
        
          
            
            Bio
            My name is Bill Muchero and I’m a data-driven analyst
            with a solid foundation in both business strategy and
            technical analytics, holding a Master’s in Data Science and
            Analytics and a Bachelor’s in International Business. My
            skills in Power BI, Python, R, and SQL help me turn complex
            data into clear, actionable insights that support smarter
            decision-making.
            In previous roles, I’ve built interactive dashboards,
            researched AI tools for qualitative analysis, and
            contributed to cross-functional projects focused on data
            collection and visualization. I’m passionate about solving
            problems with data and making a measurable impact through
            analytical thinking and effective communication.
            
            
            Education
            Grand Valley State University | Grand
            Rapids, MI
            M.S. in Data Science & Analytics | August 2023 -
            April 2025
            Cornerstone University | Grand Rapids,
            MI
            B.S. in International Business | August 2018 - May
            2022
            
            
            Experience
            Partners Worldwide | Data and Impact
            Analyst Intern | May 2024 - August 2024
            Partners Worldwide | Global Operations
            Team Assistant | January 2022 - May 2023
            Global Nomads Group | Business Analyst
            & CCL Co-Team Leader | January 2022 - May 2022
